document.full_text: taking cholesterol-lowering statin drugs such as pfizer's lipitor and astrazeneca's crestor could help prevent people dying from pneumonia, according to a study by british scientists released on tuesday.
document.title: study finds statins reduce pneumonia death rates
lines_and_colors: taking cholesterol-lowering statin drugs such as pfizer's lipitor and astrazeneca's crestor could help prevent people dying from pneumonia, according to a study by british scientists released on tuesday.
